availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ebenezer J. Thompson (Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Serepta Thompson. Married to Ursula B. Stiles Thompson in Mason County on December 18, 1861. Father of Ida Thompson. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860. Farmer in Bracken County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Eastern District, p. 48.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Germantown, p. 362B.
